/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
